pageProduct.description:
Â 

Information

Because fast relief from a vaginal itch, needs strong medication you can trust.

If you have a vagina, you've probably felt itch in that area at some point in your life. Vaginal itch is so common, in fact, almost 1 in 3 women aged over 15 have experienced vaginal itching.* And, as you may know, itch isn't a one a size fits all sensation. The feeling ranges from slightly bothersome to very irritating to OMG-my-vagina-is-on-fire. Needless to say, we are of the mind that vaginal itch is less of a dirty secret and more of a standard experience of womanhood. However, when itch does happen, it's important to know what may be causing it so you can get relief.

We'll help you find the right product for you:

Vagisil Feminine Itching Cream Medication
